name: 2019 International Conference on Advances in Biological Science and Technology
content:
2019 International Conference on Advances in Biological Science and Technology is organized by Aisa-Pacific Association of Natural Science and Technology, will be held in the hotel The Tawana Bangkok, Thailand during December 26-28, 2019\. ICABST2019 will include keynote speeches, invited speeches, oral presentations and poster presentations. The conference certification will be issued to all attendees including listeners. 
 As an annual gathering, it provides an extensive platform for scientists, researchers and scholars to present their research results and newest findings in all fields of Biological Science and Technology, discuss the practical challenges encountered recommend better solutions for biotechnology. The last conference, successfully held in Zhengzhou, China, attracted about 200 participants from all over the world. 
 Please circulate ICABST2019 to the attention of any of your colleagues who may be interested in participating (click to download conference flyer). We sincerely invite you to join us and hope you will have a fruitful experience during your stay in Thailand!
